pages.text: When the $(aura) levels in the area are extremely low, to the point that $(item)Natural Decay$() has already done all of the work it can, but the levels are still not increased, nature itself loses stability to the point of $(item)Unstable Outbreak$(): $(thing)Explosions$() will start sporadically occuring in a large area on the surface, their severity and interval varying based on the severity of the imbalance.
